column14: Over the past few months I have used a variety of The Heavenly Life bar soaps and have liked them all. My experience continues to be favorable. I have used them on my body and as a face mask. I use this particular one as a 5 minute face mask. I want the benefit of the snail slime!

column6: A special soap with different properties for healing skin.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2020
column13: Vine Customer Review of Free Product
column14: This is an interesting bar of soap.  I got this because I have another soap of this Heavenly Life brand with Donkey Milk, and I really like it.  This soap is a pretty shade of light green, has straight sides, and smells really nice.  It is intended more for it's healing properties, as it uses Snail Serum.  New one on me, had no idea that the mucus/slime from snails was even used for anything.  Well, it's apparently been used for a very long time, is an ancient special formula ingredient that helps to repair skin and wound recovery, with superior healing.  It also improves the texture and appearance of skin, as in, an anti-aging look.  It is also recommended to use this soap as a 5 minute mask.

column14: i like this brand because their product scents remind me of scents that you don‚Äôt smell very much of anymore. it‚Äôs a turkish brand and i‚Äôm not familiar with it but i‚Äôve tried another bar by them that was a face mask and liked it. this looks like it‚Äôs face soap but i‚Äôm using it as a body bar to help soften and nourish my skin. it‚Äôs on the small side for bath use but i like using it this way and it doesn‚Äôt leave a residue or leave my skin dry. $14 is a little expensive for this size bar if you use it as a body bar, but if you plan to use it as a face cleansing bar it‚Äôs not bad! overall happy with the product and will get more whenever i want to pamper myself :)

column6: It cleans well and doesn't dry my face at all.  Will last you a long time
column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2021
column13: Vine Customer Review of Free Product
column14: This soap is great!  It lasts a very long time.  Plus I like how soft it makes my skin.  It cleans well and doesn't dry my face at all.  I tend to have sensitive skin that get irritated by perfumes or harsh soaps.  This soap did not cause my any issues except that it did sting my eyes if I got it in them.  I do feel that the benefits of this soap in terms of moisturizing and anti-aging are true to an extent.  However, I did not see any skin regeneration or wound recover results as the soap claims.  But overall, I find the quality of what it does do superior to many bar soaps on the market and feel it is worth the price.
